Headline: 6 Jackson Park Express and 28 Stony Island Temporary Northbound  Reroute near 47th/DuSable Lake Shore Dr.
ShortDescription: Northbound 6 Jackson Park Express and 28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted, due to an accident near 47th/DuSable Lake Shore Dr.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound  #6 Jackson Park Express and #28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted via Lake Park, 47th, Cottage Grove, Pershing, Lake Shore Drive and over normal route, due to an accident near 47th/DuSable Lake Shore Dr.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
